docs.title: Kommandos
docs.text:
• mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project.
  • mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server.
  • mkdocs build - Build the documentation site.
  • mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit.

docs.title: Project layout
docs.text:
mkdocs.yml    # The configuration file.
docs/
    index.md  # The documentation homepage.
    ...       # Other markdown pages, images and other files.

docs.title: Gallery
docs.text:
Built-in GLightbox gallery feature can be used by adding attribute data-gallery through markdown_extensions attr_list. The image with the same gallery name will be grouped as a galley in the light box. Enable attr_list via mkdocs.yml:

markdown_extensions:
  - attr_list

Check more details about attr_list on the official document.

docs.title: Demo
docs.text:
There are two galleries: taipei and seattle.

```markdown title="Setting gallery with data-gallery attribute"

docs.title: Taipei
docs.text: ![Taipei, Taiwan. Credit: Yuyu Liu](yuyu-taipei-city.jpeg){data-gallery="taipei"}  Taipei, Taiwan. Credit: Yuyu Liu   ![Taipei, Taiwan. Credit: Yuyu Liu](yuyu-taipei-sky.jpeg){data-gallery="taipei"}  Taipei, Taiwan. Credit: Yuyu Liu

docs.title: Seattle
docs.text: ![Seattle, America. Credit: Yuyu Liu](yuyu-seattle-1.jpeg){data-gallery="seattle"}  Seattle, America. Credit: Yuyu Liu   ![Seattle, America. Credit: Yuyu Liu](yuyu-seattle-2.jpeg){data-gallery="seattle"}  Seattle, America. Credit: Yuyu Liu   ![Seattle, America. Credit: Yuyu Liu](yuyu-seattle-3.jpeg){data-gallery="seattle"}  Seattle, America. Credit: Yuyu Liu

docs.title: Dark and light mode
docs.text:
If you are using the mkdocs theme is material, then we provide an option auto_themed to support the dark and light mode of the material theme. When enabled, the image with the same theme will be grouped as a galley in the light box. This is done by automatically adding attribute data-gallery to images with the same theme.

Check more details about the dark and light mode on the official document.
